favourite.article: You must sail on, sail on Press on, press on You must go on and on in the Lord.
Press on! Press on in the Lord!!
I love this song very much. It encourages us to go on in the LORD. Our labor is not in vain in the LORD. We must go on, go on in the LORD, whatever circumstances is.
I love this hymn so much! It always encourages me! Yesterday's gone and His mercies are new. We must go on in the Lord!
We must GO ON! Praise the Lord for His all sufficient grace and supply.
Heard it first at the Churches in West Africa Young People Conference. It’s always an encouragement to me everyday of my life. Love the song, it's cool. May His grace be with all of you.
It is all about life. Forward we ought to go, for God is good always regardless of situations in our lives. Yes GOD is love, indeed!
Although, it is very difficult sometimes, but we must go on, because Christ has won the victory!!! Lord keep us in Your up to date present move. In the recovery of Christ as our life. Amen!
Praise the Lord for his mercy, yes we must go no in the Lord.Amen.
Amen! Go on, go on IN THE LORD. Oh, Lord, thankyou that your mercies are new everyday! Does anyone know if this is from the Bible? If yes, which verse is it?

Amém! Nothing is too important to we be worried with! Not yesterday, neither tomorrow! We must go on in the Lord! Even the good experiences we have to abandon to gain more of a new and richest Christ! Praise the Lord!

"To worry is vain, He will care for your needs."
May we learn to cast off all anxieties and fully lean on the One who provides for His loving seekers.
This song encourages me when I feel upset or when I'm down. I love it!
